title: How to Find Trending Sounds on TikTok

steps.title: Check the TikTok Creative Center's list of trending music.
steps.content: Check the TikTok Creative Center's list of trending music. The Creative Center is the best tool for finding out what's trending on TikTok. To access Creative Center, go to https://ads.tiktok.com/business/creativecenter/inspiration/popular/music in a desktop or mobile web browser. This free tool displays songs that are currently trending on TikTok, and you can filter the list by country. Click See analytics on a track to see the trending sound's statistics, including how long it's been trending, what age range typically views this video, and viewers' related interests. On the analytics page, you can also click See related videos for a quick link to TikTok videos that used the selected song.

steps.title: Look for trends on the For You page.
steps.content: Look for trends on the For You page. The most popular sounds are often obvious on the For You page. Everyone's For You page is different, but thanks to the TikTok algorithm, no one will miss out on hearing trending songs and audio. You'll definitely be able to pick out which songs are trending just by scrolling the For You page for a few minutes and looking for repeated sounds. [1] X Research source You'll also get an idea of how these songs are used in videos, so you can use them in your own videos! similarly! You'll also get an idea from the comment section on what to avoid or improve on.

steps.title: Search for trending sounds on TikTok.
steps.content: Search for trending sounds on TikTok. You can search for the word "trending" or "viral" on TikTok to find trending sounds. Just tap the search icon, enter "Trending," then tap Sounds to filter the results. Sounds with the "popular" label are the ones trending at the moment. Using these songs in your own videos can get you a quick visibility boost ! You can also tap the search icon and search for "viral sounds" to find some videos tagged with trending sounds. If you know what sound you're looking for, but don't know its name, try searching for keywords or sentences present in the sound to find it.

steps.title: Browse TikTok's popular and viral sound playlists.
steps.content: Browse TikTok's popular and viral sound playlists. You can see what the trending songs are when you create a new video. Tap the + at the bottom of TikTok to create a new video, then tap the music note icon at the top to open the Sounds panel. This takes you to the "Popular" tab, where you can scroll through a list of popular sounds on TikTok. Tap TikTok Viral to check out a list of sounds that are going viral . You can also tap New Releases to see if you can jump on the next trend ahead of your competitors.

steps.title: Check Spotify and Apple Music playlists.
steps.content: Check Spotify and Apple Music playlists. Popular TikTok songs will most likely be added to a ton of playlists. Searching any popular streaming platform can help you discover what music is trending on TikTok. Just search for "TikTok" and check out playlists of trending TikTok sounds.

steps.title: View the charts at Tokboard and TokChart.
steps.content: View the charts at Tokboard and TokChart. These two sites are great free tools that document trending sounds on TikTok. Head over to https://tokboard.com or https://tokchart.com in a web browser to check out the results. At Tokboard, the top result will be the most widely used song on TikTok in the last week. You'll also see how many videos have used the song as well as how many views it's had. Click the song title to see more information about it, like current hashtags, top countries, and a link to the sound on TikTok. TokChart lists the trending and growing audio. To see trending audio, click Trending at the top of the page and browse the list.

steps.title: Search YouTube for what's trending.
steps.content: Search YouTube for what's trending. YouTube is a great place to learn about TikTok trends, including trending sounds. Simply enter "trending TikTok songs" into the search bar and you'll get a lot of results. You'll also find plenty of great YouTube channels that document what's popular on TikTok .

steps.title: Look at the Billboard Hot 100 chart.
steps.content: Look at the Billboard Hot 100 chart. Trending TikTok songs tend to also be on the Billboard charts nowadays. Go to https://www.billboard.com/charts/hot-100/ to see the top 100 songs for the week. According to TikTok, more than 175 trending songs were also on the Billboard in 2021, which is twice as many as in 2020. So, the trend is likely to continue that viral songs on TikTok are also featured on the Billboard Hot 100 chart. [2] X Research source

steps.title: See what your competitors are using.
steps.content: See what your competitors are using. See which sounds others in your industry or niche are using and how their audiences react. Do their videos get more likes when they use certain sounds? Use those sounds in your own videos! Do their followers indicate that they're using the sound incorrectly? Learn from their mistakes!
